sources.title: Bangkok Rush | FULL MOVIE | Action, Thriller | Martial Arts Time-loop
sources.description:
Trapped in a time loop, Alex continues fighting to escape assassins viciously pursuing him through the streets of Bangkok.

Dean Alexandrou, Selina Lo, Byron Gibson, Ron Smoorenburg, Kecha Khamphakdee, Alexander Winters, Natalie Lorence, Damian Mavis, Richard Dee Roberts, Michael Aston

2016

Directed by Daniel Zirilli

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: Alex, stuck in a repeating loop of time, must navigate his way through the bustling streets of Bangkok with mysterious men on his heels trying to kill him. Parkour, martial arts, shoot outs and car flips all result in his death until the last loop.
metadata.Actors: Hari Das Ahatefu, Dean Alexandrou, Michael Aston
